Spectre.2015.REAL.HD-TS.XVID.AC3.HQ.Hive-CM8

CM8 Doing It Right The First Time

Sources:

Video: Unmarked 720p Mandarin Telecine
Audio: Sweet Line Big Thx to S4NDM4N

Notes:

may be last on this one, but i only do quality stuff, and i dont sell you mic as line audio
Encoded 1 week for you guys, a lot of time went into this
tried playing with latino vid for 2 days, too dark, deleted
tried playing with russian vid for 2 days, not good enough,deleted
tried playing with 4 different mandarin Telecine with all kind of different watermarkings to merge to one good, were jerky deleted

finally got the good one, no kind of watermarkings, no floating one no constant ones, simply great

Encode:

video needed fixing brightness,contrast and a lot of fixing colours
found a very nice way, looks awesome now, pretty similar to my iron man 3 release

since the mandarin telecine came with mic audio and cpl groups sold it as line eventhough it clearly isnt i asked S4NDM4N to get me a real line
for this awesome release which we got so now all is perfect together
audio is lipsynced to my video

hardcoded original english subs for foreign parts only too, while i was at it-seen at last pic below

this will do me till retail, not even a web-dl is needed in this case
enjoy

Video: 720x352 @bitrate 3000-8000
Audio: English Line Stereo 2.0
Sample: yes 2 included voice and action scene

PS:
guys cpl screeners are out you know where to find me
"the walk" "99 homes" are hottest so far, but am taking any other too
